com.steank.regularcommands.commands

Class PermissionData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.steank.regularcommands.commands.PermissionData

  • public class PermissionData
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information about the permissions required to run a command.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PermissionData()
      Creates a new PermissionData object with no required permissions or operator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPermission(org.bukkit.permissions.Permission permission)
      Adds a required permission to the list.
      void removePermission(org.bukkit.permissions.Permission permission)
      Removes a permission from the list.
      void setRequiresOp(boolean requiresOp)
      Sets whether or not operator is required.
      boolean validateFor(org.bukkit.permissions.Permissible permissible)
      Tests if the provided Permissible has all the permissions specified by this PermissionData object.

      • validateFor

        public boolean validateFor(@Nonnull
                           org.bukkit.permissions.Permissible permissible)
        Tests if the provided Permissible has all the permissions specified by this PermissionData object.
        Parameters:
        permissible - The Permissible to test for
        Returns:
        Whether or not the Permissible has, at minimum, all the required permissions
